TopicTitle: Guys, look closley at this VERY CLOSLEY

Articles.Content:
I found this in a blog post by the team of ksp!

It reads:

KerbalKon 3rd anniversary

December 12, 2013

Edited November 17, 2013 by kenbobo
Spelling mistake

Forum search: Kerbalcon

There is even an official posting from SQUAD with this exact same image.
Yes. The starry background with the blacked out letters. This has already achieved old news status. But thank you anyway.
I looked VERY CLOSLEY and didn't see anything.
I looked very closely and found several other threads about this very subject.
I just had to lean over my screen to see it. At first I thought it would be spelled out in the stars.

I looked VERY CLOSLEY and didn't see anything.

Then I hope your eyes are good enough to find the nearest optician.

In the mean time:
Oohh, I see it now. he misspelled "closely" in the thread title as "closley"! Do I win a prize?

Gentlefolks, not every forum member reads in the same order or with the same frequency, so there will be times when somebody is excited about something *you* have already seen. That's no reason to poke fun or poop on someone else's excitement. Just move along, before somebody else beats *you* to the newer stuff. Thread closed before some more grouches chime in.

This has indeed been posted about previously, even though the excitement is understandable it doesn't really warrant multiple threads about the exact same thing.

Thread closed.

Edit: Ninja'd
